message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.SI. 

This paper deals with natural language processing and machine learning techniques to infer semantic properties of documents. The paper specifically focuses on product reviews, which falls under the domain of information retrieval (cs.IR) and sentiment analysis (cs.CL). The use of latent topic models and Bayesian inference also suggests a connection to machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper's emphasis on leveraging user-generated content and free-text annotations suggests a possible connection to social media analysis (cs.SI).
